TopicTitle: The grand KSP2 tutorial discussion thread

Articles.Content:
So, as I've not seen any master thread related to KSP2 tutorials... Now there's one.

--

 

I just noticed something weird in the "How Do Rockets Work?" tutorial (screenshot from YT, thanks @Space Scumbag for the footage :) ):

Is that Kerbin's south hemisphere? Because it really looks like Kerbin's southern hemisphere. This feels so weird...
